duties_responsibilities.duty: Answer incoming telephone calls on a multi-line system and provide excellent customer service by resolving concerns and responding to inquiries
Coordinate services provided to customers according to policies and procedures, and provide customer education as needed

Maintain excellent schedule adherence and productivity standards and handle customer contacts in a timely and efficient manner, including patient and staff transfers, provider messaging, inquiries, complaints, and feedback calls
Participate in weekly learning components and ongoing training opportunities, and perform other administrative or clerical duties and projects as assigned

Communicate with patients in a confidential, professional manner using tact and diplomacy when paging on-call providers for medical concerns, and utilize Epic to assist the Clinical Neurosciences Center in new patient referral services and urgent clinical messages, and operate as an answering service, providing telephone and paging support for specific hospital departments and clinics

education_certification.credential: One year of call center, medical clinic experience, or customer service (including retail, security, and other customer-facing positions)
